inclusive_banking_for_inspiring_people_t: Alternative financial experiences for inspiring people
first_circle_text: At Hoili we are rethinking business banking by crafting financial experiences made personal, transparent and simple; with the ambition to help  entrepreneurs, startups, SMEs and Freelancers based in Mexico to make better decisions about their money, their business and their future. It’s time to rethink business banking as we know by giving you the control of your financial present and future.
second_circle_text: SMEs generates 72% of the employment in Mexico, it represents 52% of the GDP, these are the businesses that make Mexico competitive, This is the people that create a change and growth in our country, this is the people that inspire us. However it is not easy to be in SMEs, they face myriad problems on a day-to-day basis. From finding and managing cash flows, unexpected outgoings, and outstanding bills that won’t wait to be paid, getting financing options, truth is money anxiety persists in every business. No one is immune.
third_circle_text: Hoili bank app will help you to control, manage and grow your business, we want to give you a personalized experience by having a clear overview your expenses, create budgets and setting goals that will make improve your financial health and the set of tools that will let you focus on your business. We aim to be one stop place to find all the tools needed to control and grow your business from online accounting to getting the best financing options.
Cras_mattis_ante_fermentum_text: Hoili is a smart business account for freelancers, SMEs and Startups to help you manage, control and grow your business and don't worry we will make it easy :)!
Lorem_ipsum_dolor_sit_amet_text: Get an smart business account within minutes, Pay and get paid, deposit your capital in few clicks, Be in control of your expenses, Control your budget with a beautiful debit card
Lorem_ipsum_dolor_sit_amet_text2: You can add team members in a few seconds. As soon as they fill some information about them for security purposes, they will be ready to use, Team access for a full overview, Control your budget and the business expenses of your team. Admins can receive notifications of all (or only some) activity on the account. Everything stays under control
Lorem_ipsum_dolor_sit_amet_text3: A beautiful overview of your cashflow and revenue in real time, Set goals and grow your business, Control and improve your financial performance indicators.
Fusce_consequat_text: Toolbox to automate and accelerate your business
Lorem_ipsum_dolor_sit_amet_text4: Automate your payroll and payments, digital invoicing, connect to other apps with Hoili verified account.
sign_up_for_our_text: Sign up for our mailing list, and be first in line when we launch.
contact_us_text: Sign up for our mailing list now and be first to know when we go live, stay up to date with new developments.
Crafted_with_text: © Crafted with ♥ Oslo and Mexico city
we_are_still_working_text: © Hoili Financial. All rights reserved. We are working hard to make Hoili the best financial experience for you; in the meantime sign up to our mailing list to get the latest updates about our launch.
